instruction: Given a recipe and its ingredients, come up with an improved version of the recipe.
input:
Recipe: Meatloaf
Ingredients: Ground beef, eggs, bread crumbs, ketchup
output: Try this delicious twist on traditional meatloaf! Combine 1 1/2 pounds of ground beef, 2 eggs, 1 cup of bread crumbs, 1 cup of ketchup, and 1/2 cup of diced onion in a large bowl. Mix all the ingredients until combined, then shape the mixture into a loaf. Place the loaf in a greased baking dish and bake at 350°F for 1 hour. Top with more ketchup and serve.
